feed.title: Kitsu Status
feed.subtitle: Status alerts for Kitsu, an anime & manga tracker.

entry.title: Feed & Notifications Delayed
entry.content:
Posts and notifications are not appearing on user feeds.

Posts are not being lost and will appear in user feeds when once the post queue has decreased. Comments and likes are not affected by this.

2020-08-17T14:38:07.000Z
Monitoring

We are investigating the cause of this incident.

2020-08-17T16:02:09.000Z
Update

There is an issue with our worker services that handle feed posts and notifications that are preventing them from being sent to users.

2020-08-17T16:48:26.000Z
Mitigated

The issue has been remediated and the queue for delivering posts and comments are going down. We are continuing to monitor for any futher issues.

2020-08-17T17:05:19.000Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

entry.title: DNS Outage
entry.content:
Our domain auto-renewal payment was rejected by PayPal.

2020-08-10T19:20:00.000Z
Resolved

We have approved the rejected payment. Service may remain degraded for several hours while the DNS records re-propogate.

entry.title: Login Problems
entry.content:
Logins are failing, our engineers are working on the problem.

2020-07-30T19:35:24.000Z
Mitigated

There is an issue with a legacy database that stores Aozora data. We've disabled Aozora transfers for the moment to fix this for other users, and we will be restoring service for Aozora users shortly.

2020-07-30T19:45:00.000Z
Resolved

We've restored service for Aozora users, everything should be running smoothly again now!

entry.title: Cloudflare Outage
entry.content:
Our API is down in some areas due to a large internet provider outage. We are monitoring the situation and will keep you updated

2020-07-17T23:09:29.000Z
Resolved

Cloudflare has announced the all-clear and Kitsu should be reliably back online. Thank you for your patience
